      • saveOrder

        @RolesAllowed(value="SaveOrder")
public OrderEto saveOrder(OrderEto order)
        Description copied from interface: UcManageOrder
        If no ID is contained creates the OrderEto for the first time. Else it updates the OrderEto with given ID. If no OrderEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        saveOrder in interface UcManageOrder
        Parameters:
        order - the OrderEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the persisted OrderEto.

      • verifyUpdate

        private void verifyUpdate(Order currentOrder,
                Order updateOrder,
                List<OrderPositionEto> positions)
        Parameters:
        currentOrder - is the current Order from the persistence.
        updateOrder - is the new Order to update to.
        positions - the List of positions or null if undefined.

      • verifyOrderStateChange

        private void verifyOrderStateChange(Order updateOrder,
                          OrderState currentState,
                          OrderState newState,
                          List<OrderPositionEto> positions)
        Verifies if an update of the OrderPositionState is legal.
        Parameters:
        updateOrder - the new Order to update to.
        currentState - the old/current OrderState of the Order.
        newState - new OrderState of the Order to be updated to.
        positions - the List of positions or null if undefined.
